system.description: Through sacred ritual, the emotional centers of your brain have been removed, granting immunity to fear and emotional disturbance at the cost of your creativity and humanity.
system.benefit: Remove the creative, emotional part of the brain. Become immune to fear, pinning, and any effect as a result of emotional disturbance including relevant mental disorders (which are replaced with new ones of equal severity).
system.notes: Replaces emotional disorders with new ones of equal severity

specialAbilities.name: Emotionless Logic
specialAbilities.description: You are immune to fear, pinning, and any effect from emotional disturbance. Emotional mental disorders are replaced with new ones of equal severity.
